title: Photos from the set of "Captain America: Civil War"
title_page: Photos from the set of "Captain America: Civil War"
text:
"Captain America: Civil War" is filming at Peachtree Christian Church in Midtown today, across the street from The Temple, where extras were staging.
The interfaith effort turned traffic into a holy mess but the cast and crew have all been blessedly polite. Amen!
PAST COVERAGE:
Photos from the Buckhead set
Chris Evans spotted toning his "monster" physique at Atlanta gym
Scarlett Johansson, Chris Evans spotted in Buckhead
"Captain America: Civil War" films in downtown Atlanta, Buckhead hotel
"Captain America: Civil War" is filming at Peachtree Christian Church today. I'd recommend an alternate route if you can take one. Photos: Jennifer Brett
Officers had to stop traffic a few times during filming. Photos: Jennifer Brett
Extras prepare to head across the street. Photos: Jennifer Brett
Marvel's “Captain America” threequel stars Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Downey Jr., Paul Rudd, Elizabeth Olsen, Jeremy Renner, Emily VanCamp, Paul Bettany, Sebastian Stan Martin Freeman, Chadwick Boseman, Anthony Mackie, Frank Grillo, Daniel Brühl, Don Cheadle and William Hurt.
Peachtree Christian Church Pastor Barry McCarty said the “cast and crew have been incredibly nice onsite guests.”
